page.title: 03 EDUCATION
page.content:
EDUCATION IN GOREBRIDGE
GREENHALL HIGH SCHOOL
GREENHALL HIGH SCHOOL IS THE SCHOOL WHICH SERVES THE GOREBRIDGE AREA. IT IS SITUATED ON ONE SITE IN MODERN PURPOSE BUILT ACCOMODATION. EACH SUBJECT DEPARTMENT HAS A SUITE OF ROOMS WITH SPECIALIST ACCOMODATION FOR HEALTH AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION, ART,SCIENCE AND BUSINESS STUDIES. THE TECHNICAL, SCIENCE AND MATHS DEPTS. HAVE OPEN PLAN AREAS AND THERE IS A LANGUAGE LABORATORY FOR MODERN LANGUAGES. LECTURE THEATRES WITH VIDEO FACILITY ARE AVAILABLE TO ALL DEPARTMENTS. THERE IS A LIBRARY,TWO GYMNASIA AND A SWIMMING POOL,STUDY ROOMS FOR SENIOR PUPILS AND AMPLE PRACTICE ACCOMODATION FOR INSTRUMENTALTUITION.
